values:
i know you wanna all hear about my day today...its gonna suck. lol.

yeah, so today, i get to go to get mackenze at her studio at 11:30. mmm, fun. then i bbsit her until idk when andd then i go get joe n we're off to some appearance that i get like 60 bucks for for sure. then we get there and its like at a golf course or something and we do dances and sign autographs and stuff then we come home n then i have nothingggggggggggggg to do. oh but tomorrow i get to babysit mackenzie from 11:30 to around 5. OODLES OF FUN! :]

ksdhgkjhsg. stupid stuff.
yeah, bye.
im sick of all this shit i have to deal with.

Yeahh so last night was tons of funnnn :] haha. met some new ppl and they're pretty damn sweet. haha.

so today theres a shock game, and i'm realllllllly excited. idk why, im never normally excited, but i am today..idk. but yeah todays gonna be funnn :] tonight i had plans but they kinda went away so idk what im doing tonight. but i know im not sitting home alone, HELLLL NO. but yeah. aksghijkdhgk fun day. GET TO DRIVE WITH YOUNG JOESPH, MY FAVORITE! :] haha. but yeah. yeah.

idk what else to put. i put what i was feeling yesterday haha.

yay a new thingy. i love this things but im always too lazy to write haha.


so yeah, today should be a fun day...im hangin out with melissa for most of the day. whoopers.

lately i've figured out some stuff. i really didnt know how hard it was to deal with some stuff in your life but now i'm past that. i've figured out that you dont always need someone to be happy. im perfectly happy without someone, because you have your friends there for you. id take 10 best friends over 1 person to love any day. you can always gain love but friendships are hard to regain...i learned that you dont want to EVER drop a friend for someone also. that can ruin mostly everything in your life. its like that one person is controling you and you have no way to get out...its not fair to the friends you have to just kinda drop them to be with someone that might not be around for very long.
my friends inspired me to really step back and think about all this stuff. why bother if it wont work anyways right? sometimes you just need a friend...when people say they need someone to love, they really need someone to be there for them...which is a friend.

i cant even explain what im feeling right now. im all the emotions combined. its never really one emotion for me. and i cant explain it but i know that im gonna be okay and that i just have to deal with all the nonsense in my life. everyone around me has lived through it, so can i.


sometimes i really dont think i know what im talking about. but honestly, right now, i really know. i know how it feels to just be dumped and left to the side hanging while they go off with someone else. i know how it feels to be ditched. i know how it feels to be wanted to be hung out with. i know how it feels to ditch someone. i know the aftermath of everything happening in my life will be good. i know everythings going to be alright, i just doint know when.
